definitions.text: a native or inhabitant of Byzantium or of the Byzantine Empire
of or relating to the Eastern Orthodox Church or the rites performed in it
of or relating to or characteristic of the Byzantine Empire or the ancient city of Byzantium
highly complex or intricate and occasionally devious; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; - Sir Walter Scott
examples: Byzantine methods for holding on to his chairmanship
got his way by labyrinthine maneuvering
Oh, what a tangled web we weave
